title.en: Himitsu no Asa ni wa Kiss no Ame

altTitles.ja: ひみつの朝にはキスの雨

altTitles.en: Rain of Kiss in the Morning of Secrets

description.en:
A Young actor・ The work of the drama starring W comes to Hatogaya.
Hatogaya was enthusiastic about devoting himself to the success of this drama, but when he read the original manga, he found that there were many kissing scenes. Hatogaya , who
has no experience in kissing, is worried, but he seems to have a lot of experience. I was told by a regular customer at my part-time job that I saw him with me. He became suspicious, and when he looked into his mother's smartphone, he found a mama activity app. He was shocked to find that he had promised to meet the other man, and he followed his mother on the day ... "I want to be loved by Omega" episode.1 / Mameko Chano Shogo, who is said to have a bad eye and doesn't look like Ω, falls in love with α's older brother who is a childhood friend and always says that Shogo is cute. .. Friends who were worried about Shogo being deeply depressed made him register in the matching app and met a man named "Ichi". He wants to decline, but he doesn't know how to decline and goes to the meeting place on the day ... Also check out Kuroi Yodaka, Mabuta Mono, Sato Mobu, and DADA!
